content:
Today I chose issue 3326 for discussion!

non-idempotence of ring (when following zify)
Created by @Rob Lewis (@robertylewis) on 2020-07-08
Labels: bug, meta

Is this issue still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
This is still relevant and I haven't worked on it.
Maybe @Mario Carneiro has a guess what's going on here, but this isn't high priority.
